name: places/ChIJz7kB_UxZwokR-_QAHH9v3lU
formattedAddress: 7 Greenwich Ave, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 7 Greenwich Ave, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text:
I had the most wonderful experience at Rosecrans on 7 Greenwich Avenue in Manhattan. The ambiance is charming and inviting, with a perfect blend of a cozy cafe and a beautiful florist shop. The staff is incredibly friendly and attentive, making you feel like a valued guest.

The baristas are skilled at crafting delicious coffee and cocktails. It's a great place to relax with a glass of wine or enjoy a cup of coffee while surrounded by the lovely floral arrangements.

They also have a kitchen here and can prepare food that is equally delightful, with fresh and flavorful sandwiches that are beautifully presented.

What truly sets this place apart is the florist shop within the cafe. The flowers are exquisite, and the arrangements are artfully done. It's the perfect spot to pick up a stunning bouquet for a special occasion or simply to brighten someone's day.

Cafe Wine Bar Florist Shop on Greenwich Avenue is a hidden gem in Manhattan, offering a unique and delightful experience that combines the best of a cafe, wine bar, and florist shop. I highly recommend it for anyone looking for a charming and memorable outing in the city to relax in.

originalText.text: Oh boy this place is a true hidden gem! After a full day of exploring in the rain and drizzle, we stopped in for a much needed hot beverage and comfy place to chill. I had the Golden Turmeric Milk and it was delightful. The staff was so kind and very helpful and the environment, well I’ve never experienced anything quite so charming! ❤️

originalText.text: Rosecrans Florist & Cafe in Greenwich Village is an enchanting haven for flower enthusiasts. The exquisite floral arrangements and captivating ambiance create a perfect retreat from the bustling city life. The skilled florists' craftsmanship and attention to detail are evident in everything, infusing each visit with beauty and elegance. The café's cozy atmosphere complements the floral wonders, making it an ideal spot to unwind and savor the delightful surroundings. A visit to Rosecrans is a delightful sensory experience that leaves a lasting impression on every guest.

originalText.text: Very cozy and cute spot coffee spot. While enjoying a nice cold brew you can enjoy the gorgeous plants all around you along with flowers while sitting in nice antique furniture, definitely one of the best looking cafés I’ve been too.

text.text: Very cozy and cute spot coffee spot. While enjoying a nice cold brew you can enjoy the gorgeous plants all around you along with flowers while sitting in nice antique furniture, definitely one of the best looking cafés I’ve been too.

originalText.text:
flower shop with outdoor cafe in west village ~ haven't had a strong cup of latter for a while and this satisfies my caffeine craving! the indoor is reserved for florist and all pretty flowers. the seatings are all outdoor. they also serve food from ad hoc collective shop. best cafe to sit in this fall weather • a small oat latte is ~ $6.

No restroom though
